newsArray.title: Steve Smith Milestone: मेलबर्न टेस्ट में स्टीव स्मिथ ने फील्डिंग में किया कमाल, तोड़ा राहुल द्रविड़ का ये खास रिकॉर्ड
newsArray.description: स्टीव स्मिथ ने इंग्लैंड की पहली पारी में 2 कैच पकड़े. पहला कैच पकड़ते ही उन्होंने सर्वाधिक कैच पकड़ने के मामले में राहुल द्रविड़ को पीछे छोड़ दिया. स्टीव स्मिथ के टेस्ट मैचों में अब 212 कैच हो गए हैं. राहुल द्रविड़ ने 210 कैच लिए थे. स्मिथ से आगे सिर्फ जो रूट हैं जिनके टेस्ट में 214 कैच हैं.
keywords: australia national cricket team vs england national cricket team
aus vs eng 4th test match day 1 live score update
australia vs england test stats at melbourne
steve smith test stats at melbourne
where to watch australia national cricket team vs england national cricket team live telecast
creator: ians

newsArray.title: Why December 26 is Called Boxing Day and Its Origins
newsArray.description: News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, News Ghana, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/why-december-26-is-called-boxing-day-and-its-origins/Once Christmas Day is over, the festivities continue for many with Boxing Day, a bank holiday celebrated on December 26 that has its roots in centuries old charitable traditions rather than the sport of boxing or gift wrapping. Taking place on Thursday, December 26, 2025, the holiday has been officially celebrated as a bank holiday [...] News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, News Ghana, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/why-december-26-is-called-boxing-day-and-its-origins/
creator: news ghana

newsArray.title: Vijay Hazare Trophy | ఇటు సీనియర్లు.. అటు కుర్రాళ్లు.. శతకాలతో దద్ధరిల్లుతున్న స్టేడియాలు..!
newsArray.description: Vijay Hazare Trophy : అంతర్జాతీయ మ్యాచుల్లో టన్నుల కొద్దీ పరుగులతో రికార్డులు నెలకొల్పిన భారత స్టార్లు దేశవాళీలోనూ చితక్కొడుతున్నారు. రో-కోకు పోటీగా ఇషాన్ కిషన్, రింకూ సింగ్, దేవ్‌దత్ పడిక్కల్, ధ్రువ్ షోరే వంటి.. కుర్రాళ్లు సైతం సెంచరీలతో విరుచుకుపడుతున్నారు.
creator: santhosh kumar bondugula
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.sentiment_stats: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: Watch: Ashes crowd honours Shane Warne with cap-tipping tribute
newsArray.description: Watch the moment the Ashes crowd tips their caps in tribute to the late Shane Warne on Friday (26 December). During the first Ashes test at the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG) since his death in 2022, spectators donned Warne’s signature floppy hat and tipped it at 3.50pm, in tribute of his cap number being 350.
creator: the independent
